thesis.description: Five rhinovirus serotypes (types 3, 5, 14, 17, and 35) were studied using five serological techniques. The viruses were, grown in HeLa cell tissue cultures both in the presence and absence of a final concentration of 30mM magnesium chloride and antisera were produced in rabbit to each of the viral antigens. In the neutralizations test these viruses and their antisera gave only specific neutralization between each virus and its homologous antiserum.
thesis.creator: West, Roy
thesis.subject: Microbiology and Immunology.
thesis.title: Serological relationships of certain rhinoviruses
